topic.title: How much mAh in Lithium Ion Battery that is rated at 1.5 Amps & 20 Volts?
topic.body:
I got a grass trimmer recently that uses a lithium ion battery, but has no information about the capacity of the battery. It says it's 1.5 Amps & 20 Volts.

According to https://energyusecalculator.com/watts_volts_amps_ohms.htm

1.5 amps @ 20 volts is 30 watts?

Any idea how to figure out the capacity in mAh using this info?

Thank you.
